00024 float VECTOR::DotProduct(VECTOR vect)
00025 {
00026       float dot;
00027       dot = vect.x * x + vect.y * y + vect.z * z;
00028       return dot;
00029 }
00030 
00031 void VECTOR::CrossVector(VECTOR vect)
00032 {
00033       VECTOR temp = *this;
00034       x = vect.y * temp.z - vect.z * temp.y;
00035       y = vect.z * temp.x - vect.x * temp.z;
00036       z = vect.x * temp.y - vect.y * temp.x;
00037 }
00038 
00039 float VECTOR::GetMagnitude()
00040 {
00041     float magnitude = (float)sqrt(x * x + y * y + z * z);
00042     if (magnitude != 0.0f)
00043         return magnitude;
00044     else
00045         return 1.0;
00046 }
00047 
00048 void VECTOR::Normalize()
00049 {
00050     float magnitude = this->GetMagnitude();
00051     x /= magnitude;
00052     y /= magnitude;
00053     z /= magnitude;
00054 }
